user_not_registered: Are you new? I haven't seen you before
user_registered_already: No need for that, I remember you!
username_too_short: I'm sorry, I have trouble remembering short names! Try again please
username_too_long: No way I can remember that! You have to come up with something shorter!
username_invalid_characters: Could you drop those weird charaters, please? It makes my head hurt!
joke_no_current: That's weird, I didn't say nothing!
Wait until I tell you one!
joke_no_favorite: As much as I hate to admit it, you have never laughed at my joke. And that's kind of sad when you think about it
That's not possible. You don't find my jokes funny ðŸ˜”
joke_new_keyboard_button: I'm sure you haven't heard this one before!
joke_too_short: Once again, please. That was too short
joke_too_long: I already forgot the first part! Try again, but you have to cut it short!
Woah, that's way too long! Try something shorter
joke_submitted: I don't get it, but thank you!
no_new_jokes: I told you all of them!
my_jokes_invalid_choice: Please select either next or cancel.
my_jokes_no_jokes: You didn't tell me any joke yet!

remove_joke_received_not_integer: That's not a number! Try again
